main.we_are_boutique: We are a boutique headhunter specialized in IT

about.title: About Us
about.we_are_a_headhunting: We change your Monday by finding you a job that fits and makes you happy.
about.we_does_now: Who doesn't know it or hasn't experienced it at least once in their professional career? And to those who don't know it - lucky you! It’s Sunday afternoon and the dreaded thoughts that Monday is just around the corner begin. Not in the mood for Mondays? Then it's time to change something.
about.we_have_made: We have made it our mission to find a job for you that will change your Monday. That will make it an enjoyable day of the week. And even if it still doesn't become your favourite day, it can be better, right?
about.in_order_to_really: In order to really be absorbed in a job and a role, the task is of course important first and foremost. However, everything else around it is at least as important and that is different for everyone. Because we are all different and value different things.
about.thats_why_we_dont: We are not only interested in the tech stack. We find out what it's like to be part of the team through detailed conversations with our clients.
about.in_this_way: This way, our candidates learn much more about the job and do not experience any unpleasant surprises on site. Neither our candidates nor clients waste valuable time in job interviews where it then turns out that a very important point for one side is not given at all. If this had been clear in advance, the interview would not have even taken place. Every person is different. And in the same way, different points are important for each person.
about.it_is_our_job: It is our responsibility to identify exactly that. Our job is to look as deeply as possible into the company and also the role beforehand in order to present it as transparently as possible to candidates. In return, we also want to learn something about our candidates before we connect with our clients.
about.of_course_even: Of course, even we cannot guarantee 100% that it will always be a perfect fit in the end. But we can do a lot to ensure that both sides only find out about each other if we ourselves believe that it is a good fit.

list.1: I also changed my Monday and with it my entire life. After working for a leading IT recruitment agency for over a decade, most recently in the role of CSO for 4 years, it was time to do something on my own. And if not now, then when to turn everything completely upside down and rethink the industry?
list.2: Do the people make a happy impression?
list.3: Do they talk to each other a lot?
list.4: What is the mindset of the owners?
list.6: How are the working hours regulated?
list.7: Is there flexibility, home office and trust?

exp.title: What are you waiting for?
exp.text: How often do you ask yourself what is keeping you in your current job? Too often we expect something to change, but every day we do the same thing as before. But one thing is clear: nothing will change if you don't take the first step.

list.1: We have over 15 years of experience in staffing vacancies for our clients.
list.2: We are experts in the field of IT and digitalisation.
list.3: We understand that it is not only skills that are important when deciding on a new employee. Personality is also crucial. That's why we take the time to find out what is important to our clients when hiring new team members and interview our candidates in detail.
list.4: We are fast in providing results.

contact.title: You or your team have a tricky position to fill?
contact.text: Finding the right talent in the market has become an almost insurmountable task, especially in the field of tech and digitalisation.
contact.description: We are specialists in exactly this area, with over a decade of experience
contact.offer: Contact us and we will make you an individual offer

net.title: Network
net.text: This is our network we would like to recommend.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.text: Don't see a job that interests you? Send us your CV and we will get in touch with you to discuss your wishes.
jobs.description: We help you find a job that is perfect for you.  In this way, we not only change your Monday, but also the Monday in your new team at our clients. A win-win situation for both sides.
